masks-newgeneration-unofficial.callerQuote: "Look, I know I'm not the popular guy, but we have a PROBLEM. All the local coal mines closed for environmental reasons—which is GOOD—but now we have 47,000 naughty kids and nothing to put in their stockings. Can you find ethical coal alternatives?"
masks-newgeneration-unofficial.requirementsText:
• Source alternative coal—maybe activated charcoal?
  • Help Krampus Jr. navigate the supply chain crisis
  • Maybe reconsider: is coal punishment even effective?
